description.part2: Switch language between english and arabic using button above.

HeroComponent.headline: You have Extra food ?
HeroComponent.paragraph: Foodna is a the bridge between you and a hungry unfortunate family out there that does have a dinner to eat today. Help them and change thier life.

SponsorsComponent.headline: Our Sponsors
SponsorsComponent.paragraph: Our services would not be possible without the help of our generous supporters, donors, and sponsors who go above and beyond to keep foondna expand and grow.

AvailableMealsComponent.headline: Available Meals Right Now
AvailableMealsComponent.paragraph: If you are a chrity organization and you're looking for food donations then this is the perfect place for you.

TestimonialComponent.quote: Charity brings to life again those who are spiritually dead.

DonationPage.title: Donate Your Extra Food
DonationPage.content: Please fill the form bellow with the appropriate information to complete the donation process.

ContactUsComponent.title: Contact Us
ContactUsComponent.content: If you have any questions about our services and wish to contact us, please fill out the form bellow and we will respond as soon as possible.
